item.title: Making GlobalObjects
item.dc:creator: @Axiom_Owner Axiom Owner
item.description:
@Axiom_Owner wrote:

ok…im reading the tut by tico about every thing to do with servers…and i come accross the part about globalobjects but i dont get this…
To add a new global object, you need to search for:
Code: [Select]
public void NewObjects
Below the title you searched for, you need to type in: ‘addGlobalObject’.

i did this and i got this…

public void NewObjects() { //makeGlobalObject(3084, 3484, 410, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3085, 3504, 410,0,10); makeGlobalObject(3088, 3505, 6552,0,10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3497, 2560,0,10);
Could one of you please tell me were to put…‘addGlobalObject’ or show me…thanks im pretty new to this…

Read full topic
